mapper.sql: id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resId, displayName, colId, orderNum, width, editoptions, edittype, unformat, description, moduleName
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_resource_grid ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resId, displayName, colId, orderNum, width, editoptions, edittype, unformat, description, moduleName ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{resId}, #{displayName}, #{colId}, #{orderNum}, #{width}, #{editoptions}, #{edittype}, #{unformat}, #{description}, #{moduleName} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mubs_resource_grid
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
resId = #{resId},
displayName = #{displayName},
colId = #{colId},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
width = #{width},
editoptions = #{editoptions},
edittype = #{edittype},
unformat = #{unformat},
description = #{description},
moduleName = #{moduleName},
WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mubs_resource_grid ( id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resId, displayName, colId, orderNum, width, editoptions, edittype, unformat, description, moduleName ) VALUES ( #{map.id}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.resId}, #{map.displayName}, #{map.colId}, #{map.orderNum}, #{map.width}, #{map.editoptions}, #{map.edittype}, #{map.unformat}, #{map.description}, #{map.moduleName} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mubs_resource_grid
and id in (#{condition.whereSql})
limit ${offset}, ${rows}

SELECT
FROM mubs_resource_grid
AND id like '%#{id}%'
AND creator like '%#{creator}%'
AND createDate like '%#{createDate}%'
AND lastModifier like '%#{lastModifier}%'
AND lastModDate like '%#{lastModDate}%'
AND status like '%#{status}%'
AND resId like '%#{resId}%'
AND displayName like '%#{displayName}%'
AND colId like '%#{colId}%'
AND orderNum like '%#{orderNum}%'
AND width like '%#{width}%'
AND editoptions like '%#{editoptions}%'
AND edittype like '%#{edittype}%'
AND unformat like '%#{unformat}%'
AND description like '%#{description}%'
AND moduleName like '%#{moduleName}%'
